name: Pixelworld
tagline: Game created using LibGDX and our minds.
body:
#Welcome to PixelWorld website!
PixelWorld is a will-be-RPG with lots of content to come and unusual game logic!
For now it's just a draft, but more will come ;) stay tuned!

##Contacts
For contacting us you can send an email to:
alessandroracheli@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
